name: Biryani Bix
description: Smells like Hyderabadi biryani? Your dog will be like 'amma biryani' in every bite!

name: Thali Toys
description: Idli, dosa, vada in toy form – full South Indian thali for your pup’s playtime!

name: Chintu Jerky
description: Spicy Andhra-style chicken? One sniff and your dog will start dancing!

name: Guddi Ball
description: Throw the ball once, and your dog will go 'mass entry' every single time!

name: Coco Balm
description: One rub and your dog will feel like it just came from a Kerala spa trip!

name: Babu Collar
description: Bells go jing-jing when Babu walks – stylish like Tollywood hero!

name: Raju Rice
description: Crispy bites with rice power – healthy treat even grandma approves!

name: Shampoo Gali
description: Bath time turns into garden-party vibes, your dog comes out filmy-fresh!

name: Desi Daanas
description: Bandana so desi, people will say ‘Ee dog ni casting cheyyandi!’

name: Imli Chews
description: Tamarind twist with a mission – dental cleaning with full masala kick!

name: Ragulu Toy
description: Rough and tough rope toy – pull it, drag it, it won’t say ‘ayya baba’!

name: Biscuit Bits
description: Tiny chai-time nibbles for pups – one bite, and tail goes full remix!

name: Reddy Coat
description: Rain? No tension! Doggo walks like a boss in this Reddy-style raincoat!

name: Tiff Treats
description: Mini tiffin box with yummy dog snacks – full meal feel in small bites!

name: Karive Stick
description: Curry leaf twist in every chew – healthy snack with homely touch!

name: Barku Towel
description: Drying time = cuddles time. So soft, even humans feel jealous!
